function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unbalanced utilization of buildings due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding in some buildings","Mitigation":"Implementing staggered work schedules and remote working policies to reduce building occupancy","Technologies":"Building occupancy tracking systems and remote work tools","People":"Building occupants, employees, and visitors","Owner":"Building management and employers"},{"Description":"Negative economic effects on businesses","Impact":"Loss of income and potential closure of businesses, leading to economic hardship for employees and communities","Mitigation":"Financial support, subsidies, and government assistance for affected businesses","Technologies":"Online payment systems, e-commerce platforms, and digital marketing tools","People":"Business owners, employees, and local communities","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and business associations"},{"Description":"Forced reduction of quarantine period","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and higher number of deaths","Mitigation":"Adhering to public health guidelines and gradually easing restrictions based on case numbers and vaccination rates","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems, and telemedicine platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities and government"}]}
